statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -3 \\ 15 \\ 3 \\ -20 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -6 \\ 10 \\ 6 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -12 \\ 0 \\ 12 \\ 10 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
